title: 2021 Global Human Capital Trends
itunes:title: 2021 Global Human Capital Trends
description:
Erica Volini, Global Human Capital Leader at Deloitte, discusses the outlook for global human capital trends and the future of work.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
